trans-unit.source: Specifies whether a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref> object on a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> control is owner-drawn or system-drawn.
trans-unit.target: Specifica se un <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref> oggetto un <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"> </xref> controllo viene disegnato dal proprietario o dal sistema.

trans-unit.source: Use the members of this enumeration to set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> class.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare i membri di questa enumerazione per impostare il valore della <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A>proprietà di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Style property determines the way in which the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> will be displayed.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà di stile determina il modo in cui il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>verrà visualizzato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects can display simple text or be owner-drawn.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>gli oggetti possono visualizzare testo semplice o essere disegnato dal proprietario.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: Owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects support displaying images or a different font from the rest of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control, while system-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects are used to display only text (or text and an icon if an icon is specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>).
trans-unit.target: Proprietario <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>oggetti supportano la visualizzazione di immagini o un carattere diverso dal resto del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>oggetti in un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>(controllo), while dal sistema <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>gli oggetti vengono utilizzati per visualizzare solo il testo (o testo e un'icona se viene specificata un'icona nel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A>proprietà del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: To perform the owner-draw operations on an owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: Per eseguire le operazioni di disegno personalizzato in un proprietario <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem>evento del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref> is drawn by the owner.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref> displays text in the standard font.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref> Visualizza il testo nel tipo di carattere standard.
